name: MGM Steel
description: Stockist & dealer in tools & alloy steel
overview:
Established in the year 1995, we, “MGM Steel Industries, are a distinguished Stockist & dealer in tools & alloy steels. Specialist in supply of forging quality round bars & billets . Our comprehensive range includes Stainless Steel, Free Cutting Steel, Shape Steel, Cold Heading Steel, Carbon Heading Steel and Spring Steel. In addition to this, we offer Bearing Steel, Auto Steel, Cable Tapes, Narrow CR Coils, Steel Coils and GP Coils.

Our Team; Procuring agents Quality controllers Warehousing professionals Sales & marketing executives Administrative professionals

Our Vendor Base: We have forged ties with the most renowned manufacturers of Metal Pipes, Tubes, Coils, Sheets & Other Products. Our vendors manufacture these products using superior grade stainless steel, alloys and latest techniques.

Quality Assurance: Quality being the hallmark of our organization, we leave no stone unturned to offer quality products to the clients. For this reason, we procure our range of Metal Pipes, Tubes, Coils, Sheets & Other Products from recognized manufacturers of the market.

Our Expertise: We have established ourselves as one of the reliable traders, which is offering ferrous and non-ferrous products to our clients spread across the globe. Besides this, we have also developed our expertise in the manufacture of pipes and fittings to cater diverse industrial requirements. Fir this we are well equipped with sufficient resources that assist us in manufacture process thereby establishing our goodwill amongst our clients.

Client Satisfaction: Attaining cent percent customer satisfaction is one of our main motives. To achieve this motive, we offer quality range of Metal Pipes, Tubes, Coils, Sheets & Other Products, which is sourced from reputed vendors of the market.
